headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG): Evaluating If Shares Remain Undervalued After Recent Momentum
summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) has maintained steady momentum, with shares up 1.6% at the close yesterday. Investors may be watching, given its strong long-term returns and consistent revenue growth over the past year. See our latest analysis for Citizens Financial Group. CFG’s latest boost adds to a solid stretch, as momentum has built notably throughout 2024. While this week’s share price uptick is small, the stock’s long-term growth story remains impressive, posting a 36% 1-year total...
